name: smolvids
description: Simple, privacy-first video compression in the browser

scripts.build: rm -rf dist && mkdir -p dist/lib dist/vendor/ffmpeg dist/vendor/ffmpeg-util && cp index.html styles.css app.js _headers vercel.json serve.json dist/ && cp lib/*.js dist/lib/ && cp vendor/ffmpeg/* dist/vendor/ffmpeg/ && cp vendor/ffmpeg-util/* dist/vendor/ffmpeg-util/
